summary.span: 提供帮助你使用 X.509 v.3 证书的方法。

span.span: Provides methods that help you use X.509 v.3 certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按 ASN.1 der 方式是通过此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. 大多数情况下，应使用类。For most scenarios, you should use the class instead. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，则此类型实现接口。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 对于面向应用[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及更早版本类不实现接口，并因此没有`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下面的示例加载一个 X.509 证书从一个文件，调用方法，并显示到控制台的结果。The following example loads an X.509 certificate from a file, calls the method, and displays the results to the console. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按 ASN.1 der 方式是通过此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. 如果您创建通过指定的 PKCS7 签名的文件存储的证书`data`，则创建该存储区签名的证书而不是任何证书存储中。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `data`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store. ## Examples 下面的示例加载到一个 X.509 证书文件对象，将证书导出为字节数组，，然后将字节数组导入到另一个对象。The following example loads an X.509 certificate file into an object, exports the certificate as a byte array, and then imports the byte array into another object. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个新对象的 Microsoft 加密 API 证书上下文中，使用句柄`PCCERT_CONTEXT`。This constructor creates a new object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此构造函数创建证书上下文的副本。This constructor creates a copy of the certificate context. 不要假定上下文结构传递给构造函数是有效，则为它可能已经发布。Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released. 可以获取当前一份`PCCERT_CONTEXT`结构，从属性，但它的生存期内只是有效对象。You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按 ASN.1 der 方式是通过此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永远不会硬编码对源代码中的密码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以从使用程序集中检索硬编码的密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六进制编辑器，或只需在诸如 Notepad.exe 之类的文本编辑器中打开该程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您创建通过指定的 PKCS7 签名的文件存储的证书`rawData`，则创建该存储区签名的证书而不是任何证书存储中。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此构造函数使用正确的密码对私钥进行解密，并将其保存到 Microsoft 加密 API 加密服务提供商 (CSP)。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). 按 ASN.1 der 方式是通过此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永远不会硬编码对源代码中的密码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以从使用程序集中检索硬编码的密码[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六进制编辑器，或只需在诸如 Notepad.exe 之类的文本编辑器中打开该程序集。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果您创建通过指定的 PKCS7 签名的文件存储的证书`rawData`，则创建该存储区签名的证书而不是任何证书存储中。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.
